definition: Luohu district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong
gauze/to collect/to gather/to catch/to sift
surname Luo
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]
Luohu district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong

sentences.english: Renmin South Road, Luohu District, Shenzhen, China.
sentences.chinese: 人民南路，羅湖區，深圳，中國。

sentences.english: I study in Luohu Foreign Language School.
sentences.chinese: 我在羅湖外國語學校上學。

sentences.english: The next train for Lo Wu will depart from platform 2.
sentences.chinese: 下班往羅湖列車會晌二號月臺較先開出。

sentences.english: To learn the status of occupational disease hazard program reports in Luohu District of Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解深圳市羅湖區職業病危害項目申報情況。

sentences.english: You may walk across the bridge of Luohu where you take the train to Hongkong.
sentences.chinese: 你可以走過羅湖橋，在那裏你乘火車直到香港。

sentences.english: Panglin Plaza is strategically located in the heart of Shenzhen's Luohu business district and shopping area.
sentences.chinese: 彭年廣場位於深圳羅湖商業區和購物中心。

sentences.english: Luohu District, Shenzhen City is one of the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 羅湖區是深圳市的中心城區之一。

sentences.english: Every week he had to traveled a long distance in the metro from Baoan airport to my home in Luohu District to take classes.
sentences.chinese: 他每週要坐地鐵從寶安機場那邊坐到羅湖我家來上課。

sentences.english: Several hours ago, walking alone in the busy street at the Luohu District.
sentences.chinese: 幾個小時前，獨自行走在羅湖熱鬧的街區。

sentences.english: That one day, I must go to the Luohu young people palace school English.
sentences.chinese: 那一天，我要去羅湖青少年宮學英語。
